Translations.Text: Ni tiel narrate vi kelk news el generaci. Ni revealed vi message el us
Those disregard gxi bor load (de pek) Tag Resurrection
Eternally ili abide therein; ki miserable load Tag Resurrection
Ke est tag when korn blov ni summon kulp ke tag blu
(Flustr themselves ili dir Vi rest 1 life) ne plur than 10 tag
Ni est fully aware da their utterances. Plej accurate among them dir Vi rest ne plur than tag
Ili pet vi mont. Dir My Lord visx them out
Li las them barren plat land
Ne eben slightest hill testament vi seg therein nor tremp
Ke tag everyone sekv caller slightest deviation. All son hushed antaux plej Gracious; vi auxd nothing flustr
Ke tag intercession est useless escept por those permes plej Gracious whose utterances conform His vol
Li kon their preter their future while neniom encompasses His knowledge
All vizagx submit Viv Etern those who sxargx their transgressions fail
As por those worked righteousness while kred ili ne hav tim de injustice adversity
Ni tiel revealed gxi Arabic Quran ni cited en gxi all kinds da prophecies ili sav gxi kauxz them sorb heed
